moves.1. e4:
fullcaos, no offence but you played horribly

starts off fine
moves.1... Nf6 2. f3: in that situation it is much better to deelope you knight to c3 than block your queen in with the pawn
moves.2... e5 3. c3: this is an ok move, it lets your queen out but stops your knight going to c3
moves.3... Bc5 4. b4 Bb6 5. d4: probably should have threatend my bishop with c4
moves.5... exd4 6. cxd4: you now have a good position, especally those centeral pawns
moves.7... dxe4 8. fxe4 Bxd4: yes you are a point down but aren't playing badly
moves.9. Bc2 O-O: i could have taken the rook but i wanted to castle first
moves.10... Bxa1 11. exf6 Qxf6: now you aren't playing well but your not playing horrifically
moves.13... Re8: i am pinning your queen to your king the only thing you can do to save your queen is block the pin
moves.14. Nf3: now you start to play horrifically
moves.14... Rxe2+ 15. Kxe2 Qe6+ 16. Be3 Qxa2+: this is why it is called the fortress game, you have a wall of peices
moves.29... Qc5+ 30. Kf3 Re8: finally i get my rook outof the corner
moves.31... Qh5+ 32. Kf2: you had lost either a knight or bishop
moves.34... Rxe3+ 35. Kxe3 Qxg3+: resinged, didn't let me get 7 queens
